name: Neural Static Injector
description: A tiny ampule of shimmering blue liquid containing concentrated static electricity. When injected directly into the neural system, it disrupts incoming data and overloads neural pathways.

attributes.effect: DRIT - Increases elemental damage taken by 5% per use level (max +30%)

flavor.rationale: Used by those who want to temporarily scramble their cybernetic senses or disrupt a target's connection to their implants during combat.
